title: The Biggest Body Image Mistake You Can Make | Sadie Robertson Huff | Sisters & Friends
description:
Sadie, her mom, Korie Robertson, and her sister Bella Mayo offer rock solid advice on defeating an unhealthy body image. Sadie opens up about her personal body image struggles and the tools she uses to overcome them. They discuss whether having a puppy really prepares you for a baby, the value of pre-marriage counseling, how honesty can produce good fruit in relationships, and one VERY important key to a successful relationship. 
https://dwelldifferently.com/ — Get $5 off your first month with code Sadie!
-
